extendedInfo.description: Fancy learning a bit of self defense? Street Fighting volume 1 is packed with exercises, advice and real life situations to teach you the basics of self defense and help you gain confidence.  It is aimed at beginners, both men an women, and explains the technic of straight punches. The lessons are based on actual tutorials conducted by an experienced instructor. This first lesson is 67 pages long.

reviews.title: Suck big time!
reviews.comment: This apps description seems promising at first until I actually tried to use it. It was completely useless and a waste of space. The English version was unresponsive and nonexistent. Do better.
reviews.author: A Google User
